verses.roman:
samprati pṛthivīte yebā haiyāchila bhāra
avatīrṇa hañā tāhā karilā saṁhāra'

synonyms: samprati—presently; pṛthivīte—upon the earth; yebā—whatever; haiyāchila—there was; bhāra—burden; avatīrṇa hañā—descending; tāhā—that; karilā saṁhāra—You have taken away.
translation: " 'Whatever burden was upon the earth You have taken away by descending on that planet.'
